properties.areaDesc: Maalaea Bay; Big Island Southeast Waters; Pailolo Channel; Maui County Leeward Waters
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 8 at 3:38AM HST until February 10 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds up to 35 knots possible. Seas 8 to 12
feet.

* WHERE...Maui County Leeward Waters, Maalaea Bay, Pailolo
Channel and Big Island Southeast Waters.

* WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Gale Watch is issued when the risk of gale force winds of 34 to
47 knots has significantly increased but the specific timing
and/or location is still uncertain. It is intended to provide
additional lead time for mariners who may wish to consider
altering their plans.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON
